description: From Middle French abastardir, from Old French a- + bastart (“bastard”).

verbs.description: abastardize (third-person singular simple present abastardizes, present participle abastardizing, simple past and past participle abastardized)

entries.meaning: (transitive, obsolete) To stigmatize as a bastard; debase. [Attested from the late 16th century until the late 17th century.]
